H0.text: Who was the first man to walk on the Moon. Buzz Aldrin

H1.text: Who was the first man to walk on the Moon. Pete Conrad

H2.text: Who was the first man to walk on the Moon. Alan Shepard

H3.text: Who was the first man to walk on the Moon. Neil Armstrong

A4.text: About 19 minutes after Armstrong's first step, Aldrin joined him on the surface, becoming the second human to walk on the Moon.

A5.text: When Pete Conrad of Apollo 12 became the third man to walk on the Moon, on November 19, 1969, his first words referenced Armstrong.
